mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PC_COM (bcnum,bcc,mnum,mid,bctitle,bccontent,bcphoto,bchit,delyn,idate,udate) VALUES ( #{bcnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bcc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bctitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bccontent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bcphoto, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bchit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.BCNUM BCNUM ,A.BCC BCC ,A.MNUM MNUM ,A.MID MID ,A.BCTITLE BCTITLE ,A.BCCONTENT BCCONTENT ,A.BCPHOTO BCPHOTO ,A.BCHIT BCHIT ,A.DELYN DELYN ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.IDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') IDATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.UDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') UDATE
,CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.BCNUM)/#{pageSize}) pageSize ,COUNT(A.BCNUM) OVER() AS totalCount FROM PC_COM A WHERE A.DELYN = 'Y'
AND A.BCTITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.BCC LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.BCC LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.BCC NOT LIKE '%강아지%' AND A.BCC NOT LIKE '%고양이%'
AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.UDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.UDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY 1 ) WHERE pageSize = #{curPage}
